newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT- Fleming upgrades Reuters.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT- Fleming upgrades Reuters.

text.p: Analysts at Robert Fleming on Monday upgraded their recommendation on Reuters Holdings Plc to "trading buy" from "sell".
Analyst Oliver Ehrenberg noted that since he named the stock one of his "key sells of the year" in January, the shares have fallen 18 percent.
Ehrenberg added that currency worries had been overdone and gave a share price target of 680p.
The stock was trading 1/2p better at 603p by 0910 GMT.
